generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and cars driving on it.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and lined with trees.
- building: Buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including a white building on the left and a yellow building on the right.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are present along both sides of the road.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees, appearing overcast.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging above the road, showing a green light.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and signs.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible mounted on poles along the road.
- fence: A fence is visible on the left side of the road, near the white building.
